title: WHO'S TIRED OF PLAYING WITH PEOPLE WHO USE/HAVE SLOW SPEEDS
body:
Riot needs to add a separate matchmaking for people with over 500ms. I am sick and tired of playing with people trying to play on dial up or DSL and then feed or quit due to their ISP.
Matchmaking needs to consider pings, Why should i be punished because your too lazy or poor to get a standard ISP???
